text:
Region II Conference-Planning Committee Meeting
Page 2
5 November 1964
Thank you for the always first-rate job you are doing
for NAEB and educational television.
Looking forward with pleasure to seeing you in Washington
with our committee on Monday, November 16.
cc: Mr. John Young
Mr. Hugh DeSamper
Mr. Howard Holst
Mr. James Petersen
Mrs. Marjorie Newman
Mr. Roy Johnston
Mr. Gerard Appy
Mr. Ken Wright
Mr. John Hawes
Miss Betty Smith
Mr. Duff Browne
